messages.message:
Debugging tip :sparkles: : I've been always struggling with inspecting an element that will disappear when its trigger element loses focus (ex. tooltip content, select items). What I've been doing so far is to check "break on subtree modification" option.
Today, I found a better alternative: Chrome has an "Emulate a focused page" option. When it's enabled, clicking on dev tools won't cause the focused element to lose focus.
https://stackoverflow.com/a/63905339 (https://stackoverflow.com/a/63905339)
In my demo, I tried to inspect the tooltip content and wanted to add a margin to the `p` tag. 1st screen recording shows what happened when it's off and the 2nd one shows what happened when it's on.
